text: Jahanabad Vidhan Sabha Constituency is one of the 403 assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh. It is part of Fatehpur district. It contains these parts of Fatehpur district- Amauli, Tappajar, Paprenda, Jahanabad, Khajuha & Kora Jahanabad (NP) of Bindki Tehsil. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== {| class="sortable" width="70%" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px #000000 solid; font-size: x-big; font-family: verdana" ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Year ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Winner ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white" |Party ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Runner Up ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Party ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Ref. |- |1974 |Prem Datt Tiwari |Indian National Congress |Chhatrapal Verma |Bharatiya Kranti Dal | |- |1977 |Quasim Hasan |Janata Party |Chhatrapal Verma |Independent | |- |1980 |Jagdish Narain |Indian National Congress (I) |Ram Kishore Verma |Lokdal | |- |1985 |Prakash Naraian |Indian National Congress |Naresh Chandra Uttam |Lokdal | |- |1989 |Naresh Chandra Uttam |Janata Dal |Prem Datt Tiwari |Indian National Congress | |- |1991 |Chattra Pal Verma |Janata Dal |Shree Dhar Shukla |Bharatiya Janata Party | |- |1993 |Madan Gopal Verma |Janata Dal |Naresh Chandra Uttam |Samajwadi Party | |- |1996 |Qasim Hasan |Bahujan Samaj Party |Naresh Chandra Uttam |Samajwadi Party | |- |2002 |Madan Gopal Verma |Samajwadi Party |Syed Kasim Hasan |Janata Party | |- |2007 |Aditya Pandey |Bahujan Samaj Party |Madan Gopal Verma |Samajwadi Party | |- |2012 |Madan Gopal Verma |Samajwadi Party |Sameer Trivedi |Bahujan Samaj Party | |- |2017 |Jai Kumar Singh Jaiki |Apna Dal (Sonelal) |Madan Gopal Verma |Samajwadi Party | |} ==Election results== ==References== http://m.livehindustan.com/uttar- pradesh-election/constituency-jahanabad-constituency-2012 http://myneta.info/up2012/index.php?action=show_candidates&constituency;_id=238 Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh Category:Fatehpur district
